pullRequest.body:
Also extracts some lemmas from `minimals_image_of_rel_iff_rel` and remove `_on` from `maximals_image_of_rel_iff_rel_on` to match the former.

for [#9088](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/pull/9088#discussion_r1434641111)

---

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go

nodes.body: ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by YaelDillies.

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7306921577/job/19912106009)
  * [Check all files imported](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7306921577/job/19912105905)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/7306921577/job/19912105966)

```suggestion
theorem minimals_image_of_rel_iff_rel : minimals s (f '' x) = f '' minimals r x := by
```
Also, given how you use it, maybe it's better to have
```suggestion
theorem image_minimals_of_rel_iff_rel : f '' minimals r x = minimals s (f '' x) := by
```

Removed 4 pairs of parentheses.
Didn't switch the order of the equalities, because there are 3 pairs of lemmas in total, and in `image_minimals_univ` the LHS is clearly more complicated than the RHS so it'd better not be switched.
Yes, and `image_minimals_univ` disagrees with the order you currently have and instead agrees with the one I'm suggesting.
Indeed, let me switch them. Thanks!
Do you mind keeping the analogous `minimals` and `maximals` results just after each other?
Mind pulling the `{a : Î±}` to the `variable` statement?

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat: `OrderIso` between `minimals` and `maximals`

source.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(AlgebraicGeometry/PrimeSpectrum/*) : the collection of minimal prime ideals of a Noetherian ring is finite
